description.english: Join the ranks for the Planetary War
Reach the Private First Class Rank
Reach the Sergeant First Class Rank
Reach the Command Sergeant Major Rank
Reach the renowned rank: General of the Army
Look at the map for 1,000 seconds
Look at the map for 10,000 seconds
Deploy with 100,000 Domirium worth of gear cumulatively
Deploy with 500,000 Domirium worth of gear cumulatively
Deploy with 1,000,000 Domirium worth of gear cumulatively
